Features
Features: The MasterLiquid Lite 240 is a reliable, attractive entry into liquid cooling. The system features two elements: a unique, low-vibration Dual Dissipation pump for efficient processor cooling and an dual 120mm Air Balance fan for high-performance PC cooling. The system also includes kink-resistant tubing, matte-black styling, and a versatile design that fits nearly all PC cases.
